markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTasks/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Rum-Dumb Riggere](/rumDumbRiggere/) wants you to free him from his cell in the [Port Maje jail](/portMajeJail/). ## Walkthrough Rum-Dumb Riggere's freedom can be achieved through a number of means: * Riggere's freedom can be purchased from [Savia](/savia/) for {{cp2|400}}. * Assisting Savia with the task, [Restoring Order](/restoringOrder/), allows you to negotiate a discounted price of {{cp2|300}}. * The cell door can be lockpicked with [Mechanics](/mechanics/) 3. You can find a couple of [lockpicks](/lockpickDeadfire/) in a hidden straw pile towards the back of the left most cell (requires at least 14 [Perception](/perception/) to reveal). * The [Port Maje Jail Key](/portMajeJailKey/) can be acquired by pick-pocketing Savia (requires at least 1 [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/)). It is advised to unlock the door while in stealth as unlocking the door within Savia's view will turn her hostile. * {{Topic|Irresponsibility}} A [Cinder Bomb](/cinderBomb/), [Grenade](/grenade/), [Immolator](/immolator/), [Blister Bomb](/blisterBomb/), [Lightning Bomb](/lightningBomb/), [Frost Bomb](/frostBomb/) or [Implosion Charge](/implosionCharge/) can be placed on the wall outside of the [Port Maje jail](/portMajeJail/). Cinder bombs are available from [Norgund](/norgund/) on the upper floor of [The Kraken's Eye](/theKrakensEye/). * Lastly, you can just kill Savia and loot the key from her. '''Notes''' * If you unlock the door through illegal means without opening it, then bail him out legally with money, Savia will say "What? I know I locked this..." when she opens the door. * Savia rests away from the cell at certain time. * Bailing Rum-Dumb Riggere out means you have to pay his wage {{cp2|2}} per day even though your ship's still broken. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/09_Port_Maje/09_TSK_Drunk_Sailor.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Drunk Sailor''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Rum-Dumb Riggere, a sailor imprisoned in Port Maje's jail, has offered to join my ship's crew if I free him. |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''Alternate descriptions''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40001 | I broke Rum-Dumb Riggere out of jail. He wants to meet me outside. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40002 | I killed Savia and broke Rum-Dumb Riggere out of jail. He's offered to join my crew in exchange for helping him escape the island and any blame for the constable's death. |- | rowspan="7" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Free Rum-Dumb Riggere.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Riggere said that Commander Savia will free him if his fine is paid. Unfortunately, he's racked up a fine of 400 pires. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Riggere said that Savia carries the jail cell key on her person. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | It might be possible to destroy the stonework around the outside of jail window to free Riggere. It'll be noisy, but effective. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | Norgund, a merchant on the upper floor of The Kraken's Eye in Port Maje, trades in the kind of items I might need to break Riggere out of his cell. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | I killed Savia. Taking the jail cell key from her body and freeing Riggere should be my next step. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | I acquired the jail cell key from Savia. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''5''' | colspan="2" | '''Meet up with Rum-Dumb Riggere.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10005 | Now that he's free, Rum-Dumb Riggere wants to meet me by the market in Port Maje. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I paid Rum-Dumb Riggere's fine and gave him his freedom. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I broke Rum-Dumb Riggere out of jail. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | I used an explosive to destroy the bars on Riggere's jail cell window. He made his escape in the resulting chaos. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30003 | I killed Savia and broke Rum-Dumb Rigger out of jail. |}
